name: Sever The Wicked! (Commodore 64)
description:
Sever The Wicked! is a small fast-paced "coffee-break" action game. Destroy as many enemies as you can in 24 seconds! 

The further the enemy, the more points earned. Bosses grant extra points. Bonus points are given at the end of each round based on the number of enemies killed.

Try to get an unbroken combo going, combos are the key to getting higher scores.
